go_to_end.title: Blazingly Fast
go_to_end.description: "Blazingly fast" - your code and configuration all just worked. You've made it to live before lunch (go to end).

roll_forward.title: Auto Promotion
roll_forward.description: You automatically promoted from the develop to QA environment.

extra_turn.title: Change Request, Automated
extra_turn.description: You automatically created a change request.

extra_turn.title: Feature Branch Proof
extra_turn.description: You were able to test deploy your changes from a feature branch.

jump_forward.title: Auto Permissions (Your Team)
jump_forward.description: You got automatic permissions to a resource your team owns.

jump_forward.title: Auto Permissions (Cross-Team)
jump_forward.description: You got automated permissions for a resource another team owns.

generic.title: Streamlined Pipeline
generic.description: The modern pipeline eliminates friction. Move forward.

go_to_start.title: Privilege Breach
go_to_start.description: A hacker gained access to a role with a lot of access, and captured PII (back to start).

lose_turn.title: Config Drift Day
lose_turn.description: The higher environment has different configuration than the lower environment, you lose a day testing.

go_back.title: Manual Role Grind
go_back.description: You work with security to manually create your security role.

go_back.title: Mismatched Methods
go_back.description: You offer to help another team finish a project, but their deployment methodology is totally different from yours so you aren't able to help.

go_back.title: Sabbatical Script
go_back.description: Your team's custom build script isn't working, and the person who built it is on sabatical.

generic.title: Legacy Drag
generic.description: The legacy environment slows you down. Move back.
